prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon resembling a small bird with a mischievous expression and a feathered tail.
Give me a Pokemon that is predominantly black with hints of blue and has sharp, pointed wings.
Imagine a playful flying Pokemon that enjoys lurking in urban environments and causing minor trouble.
Design a small, winged creature with a sleek body and a glinting eye that can be found in forests.
Show me a mysterious bird Pokemon with a dark color palette, known for its cunning and stealthy nature.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a crow, featuring a distinctive tail and a sharp beak, often seen at night.
Make a quirky Pokemon that sports a dark feathered body and a personality that loves to play pranks.
